special_text:
[i](As this enters, choose an opponent to protect it. You and others can attack it. It gains abilities when it’s at certain defense or below.)[/i]
When Into Valakut enters, it deals 3 damage to any other target.
[b]3 Defense[/b] Stage 2
Creatures you control get +1/+0.
[b]Defeated[/b] Stage 3
Whenever a Mountain you control enters, Into Valakut deals 3 damage to any target.
